class.name: EPASController
class.brief_description: Node that controls the EPAS animation system on a given skeleton.

method.name: advance
method.description: Advances the time of the controller, called automatically unless [member playback_process_mode] is set to [constant MANUAL]

method.name: connect_node
method.description: Connects the [EPASNode] [code]from[/code] to one of [code]to[/code]'s [code]input[/code]s. Additionally, a [code]unique_name[/code] must be given, one that doesn't exist in this controller.

method.name: connect_node_to_root
method.description: Connects the [EPASNode] [code]from[/code] to the output node of this controller. Additionally, a [code]unique_name[/code] must be given, one that doesn't exist in this controller.

members.member: What callback thiis controller should use to process the animation tree.
Path to the [Skeleton3D] on which to apply this controller.
